name: Block Rain
description:
Warning: Bright, neon colors

Blockrain is simple falling block game where one must avoid being crushed by falling colorful platforms dodging falling blocks, as they slowly begin to stack up!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to move left, right and jump (space can jump as well)
  • To change the player's color, click on the player in menu!
  • To change the block theme for the game, click on the platform the player is on in the menu!

SFX/Music credit:
Menu/Game music: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
Start button sound effect: https://opengameart.org/content/ui-accept-or-forward
Game over sound effects: https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-8-bit-mini-pack

Made this small project for two main goals, those being:
1.  To make a short, simple game to completion.
2. To familiarize myself with basic mechanics for music and sound effects. 

I hope these will help me make more large scale projects in the future ^^
